generated_body: The article about the House Intel panel announcing additional witnesses for public impeachment hearings is likely to provide an overview of the committee's ongoing investigation and the new individuals called to testify. Readers may expect details on the significance of these witnesses and how their testimonies could impact the impeachment process. It is likely to highlight the political implications of these developments as the inquiry progresses.
